subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Reynolds hit a three-run homer off infielder Josh Wilson with two outs in the 18th inning, as the Diamondbacks beat the Padres in the longest major league game this season.
snippet: Mark Reynolds hit a three-run homer off infielder Josh Wilson with two outs in the 18th inning, as the Diamondbacks beat the Padres in the longest major league game this season.
